author: EllisXP
title: Help Scoop build a house!
review:
Scoop wants to help Bob by building a new house for Farmer Pickles. Can you help him and get the job done by bringing in more DUPLO bricks? Contains 21 pieces and includes Scoop, 2 red DUPLO bricks, 3 yellow DUPLO bricks, Bird, a fence and a "Caution: Bob at Work" sign!

 

 

Pros:

Scoop is buildable.

Bird is printed on a single flat DUPLO brick.

The back digger works well.

Scoop is easy to build.

 

Cons:

The sign does fall apart quite easily.

You can lose the fence and is quite tricky to find.

I'm unsure about the WARNING light, though it does rotate very well.

My Dad drew a picture of how Scoop would look in DUPLO.

 

Overall I would reccomend this to all ages.

author: maximiliam
title: Scoop or poop? May not be the best bob the builder set!
review:
this is a great set to own, but it has some downsides.



Pros:

1. It has very rare pieces.
2. It is a very colored set.
3. Scoop has a very movable back hinge.



Cons:

1. There is no minifig!
2. scoops hinges are hard to put together.
